creator: GreenGallery
descriptionHtml:
Anyone can Play Piano songs by seeing their notes and play them simultaneously.

In "Play Piano" application, you can very easily play notes ♪ of famous Songs with the help of AUTO SCROLLING Notes view and our user friendly Piano Keyboard🎹. We provide both piano keyboard view and notes view simultaneously so that it became easy to play them. We have notes of many old and new songs.
For beginners, to play any song on piano you need notes ♪ of that song
This application provides described Notes of many songs with Intro and Music tunes ♫.
With the help of search option you can very easily find notes of many songs.

Procedure➞ First listen the song carefully and then try to play that song on Piano with the help of these notes and adjust the scrolling speed according to your pace.

★★Basic features of our Application★★
➤ Smooth UI Experience
➤ Simultaneous appearance of keyboard and "Notes" display
➤ Automatically scrolling Notes View
➤ Search and find notes of song easily
➤ Notes for many old and new songs
➤ Explained in detail with full lyrics
➤ Application is easily accessible offline.

descriptionShort: Feel the melodies with simultaneous notes and piano keyboard view

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

title: Play Piano: Piano Notes | Melodies | Keyboard

creator: Fingrtips Apps
descriptionHtml:
Anyone can Play Piano melodies with the help of simultaneous piano notes and keyboard view.

Play | Practice | Save | Share

Why Play Piano?
You can play soothing melodies by yourself with the help of provided notes and the one touch piano keyboard and experience playing like a real piano. Even if you don't know that how to play piano, you can play it with the help of provided piano notes and by adjusting autoscroll speed of notes view according to your pace.
Play the melodies, practice them, save them and share to your friends.

Procedure:
First listen the song carefully and then try to play that song on Play Piano with the help of provided notes and adjust the scrolling speed of notes view according to your pace.

Highlights
⦿ simultaneous notes and piano view
⦿ autoscrolling notes with adjustable speed
⦿ record your melodies and share with your friends
⦿ detailed lyrics of many songs
⦿ no-ads subscription
⦿ request your favourite song
⦿ offline accessible (for subscribed users)


》Drop us a line or share your feedback at fingrtipsapps@gmail.com
》🌐 https://fingrtips.in
